FuncDef:
The holdtime assert command globally sets a timeout period during which PIM interfaces wait to receive Assert messages from the forwarder.
The undo holdtime assert command restores the default timeout period. The holdtime assert command globally sets a timeout period during which PIM interfaces wait to receive Assert messages from the forwarder. The undo holdtime assert command restores the default timeout period. By default, the timeout period is 180 seconds. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ParentView: IPv6 PIM view,VPN instance IPv6 PIM view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a timeout period during which PIM interfaces wait to receive Assert messages from the forwarder.
The value is an integer ranging from 7 to 65535, in seconds.
